allowColumnReordering.Description: Specifies whether or not grid columns can be reordered by a user.

allowColumnResizing.Description: Specifies whether or not grid columns can be resized by a user.

cacheEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not to enable data caching.

cellHintEnabled.Description: Enables a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a cell with truncated content.

columnAutoWidth.Description: Specifies whether or not the width of grid columns depends on column content.

columnChooser.Description: Specifies the options of a column chooser.

emptyPanelText.Description: Specifies text displayed by the column chooser panel when it does not contain any columns.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether a user can invoke the column chooser or not.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the column chooser panel.

mode.Description: Specifies how the end-user chooses columns.

title.Description: Specifies text displayed in the title of the column chooser panel.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the column chooser panel.

enabled.Description: Indicates if column fixing is enabled.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for column-fixing related commands in the column header's context menu.

fix.Description: Specifies text for a context menu item that fixes the column for which the context menu is invoked.

leftPosition.Description: Specifies text for a context menu subitem that fixes a column, for which the context menu is invoked, to the left grid edge.

rightPosition.Description: Specifies text for a context menu subitem that fixes a column, for which the context menu is invoked, to the right grid edge.

unfix.Description: Specifies text for a context menu item that unfixes the column for which the context menu is invoked.

columnHidingEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget should hide columns in order to adapt to the screen or container size.

alignment.Description: Specifies the content alignment within column cells.

allowEditing.Description: Specifies whether the values in a column can be edited at runtime. Setting this option makes sense only when editing is enabled for a grid.

allowFiltering.Description: Specifies whether or not a column can be used for filtering grid records. Setting this option makes sense only when the filter row and column header filtering are visible.

allowFixing.Description: Specifies whether or not the column can be anchored to a grid edge by end users. Setting this option makes sense only when the columnFixing | enabled option is set to true.

allowGrouping.Description: Specifies whether the user can group data by values of this column. Applies only when grouping is enabled.

allowHeaderFiltering.Description: Specifies whether or not to allow filtering by this column using its header.

allowHiding.Description: Specifies whether or not a column can be hidden by a user. Setting this option makes sense only when the column chooser is visible.

allowReordering.Description: Specifies whether or not a particular column can be used in column reordering. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowColumnReordering option is set to true.

allowResizing.Description: Specifies whether or not a particular column can be resized by a user. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowColumnResizing option is true.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies if a column can be used for searching grid records. Setting this option makes sense only when the search panel is visible.

allowSorting.Description: Specifies whether grid records can be sorted by a specific column at runtime. Setting this option makes sense only when the sorting mode differs from none.

autoExpandGroup.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not when records are grouped by a specific column. Setting this option makes sense only when grouping is allowed for this column.

calculateCellValue.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns a value to be displayed in a column cell.

calculateDisplayValue.Description: Specifies how to get a value to be displayed in a cell when it is not in an editing state.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies a callback function that defines filters for customary calculated grid cells.

calculateGroupValue.Description: Specifies a field name or a function that returns a field name or a value to be used for grouping column cells.

calculateSortValue.Description: Specifies a field name or a function that returns a field name or a value to be used for sorting column cells.

caption.Description: Specifies a caption for a column.

cellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for grid column cells.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to a column.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in the cells of a column.

dataField.Description: Specifies the field of a data source that provides data for a column.

dataType.Description: Specifies the required type of column values.

editCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for the cell of a grid column when it is in an editing state.

editorOptions.Description: Specifies configuration options for the editor widget of the current column.

encodeHtml.Description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the column.

falseText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all false items with a specified text.

filterOperations.Description: Specifies the set of available filter operations.

filterType.Description: Specifies whether to include or exclude the records with the values selected in the column's header filter.

filterValue.Description: Specifies a filter value for a column.

filterValues.Description: Specifies initial filter values for the column's header filter.

fixed.Description: Indicates whether the column takes part in horizontal grid scrolling or is anchored to a grid edge.

fixedPosition.Description: Specifies the grid edge to which the column is anchored.

format.Description: Specifies a format for the values displayed in a column.

formItem.Description: The form item configuration object. Used only when the editing mode is "form".

groupCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for the group cell of a grid column.

groupIndex.Description: Specifies the index of a column when grid records are grouped by the values of this column.

headerCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for the header of a grid column.

headerFilter.Description: Specifies column-level options for filtering using a column header filter.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the data source to be used for the header filter.

groupInterval.Description: Specifies how header filter values should be combined into groups.

hidingPriority.Description: Specifies the order according to which grid columns must be concealed when the widget adapts to the screen or container size.

isBand.Description: Specifies whether the column bands other columns or not.

lookup.Description: Specifies options of a lookup column.

allowClearing.Description: Specifies whether or not a user can nullify values of a lookup column.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the data source providing data for a lookup column.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the expression defining the data source field whose values must be displayed.

valueExpr.Description: Specifies the expression defining the data source field whose values must be replaced.

name.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column.

ownerBand.Description: Specifies the band column that owns the current column. Accepts the index of the band column in the columns array.

precision.Description: Use the format | precision option instead.

selectedFilterOperation.Description: Specifies the default filter operation of a column.

setCellValue.Description: Specifies a callback function to be invoked after the cell value is edited by an end-user and before the new value is saved to the data source.

showEditorAlways.Description: Specifies whether or not the column displays its values by using editors.

showInColumnChooser.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the header of a hidden column in the column chooser.

showWhenGrouped.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the column when grid records are grouped by it.

sortIndex.Description: Specifies the index of a column when grid records are sorted by the values of this column.

sortOrder.Description: Specifies the initial sort order of column values.

trueText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all true items with a specified text.

validationRules.Description: Specifies an array of validation rules to be checked when updating column cell values.

visible.Description: Specifies whether a column is visible or not.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the sequence number of the column in the grid.

width.Description: Specifies a column width in pixels or percentages.

customizeColumns.Description: Specifies a function that customizes grid columns after they are created.

customizeExportData.Description: Customizes grid columns and data before exporting.

dataSource.Description: Specifies a data source for the grid.

editing.Description: Contains options that specify how grid content can be changed.

allowAdding.Description: Specifies whether or not new grid records can be added at runtime.

allowDeleting.Description: Specifies whether or not grid records can be deleted at runtime.

allowUpdating.Description: Specifies whether or not grid records can be edited at runtime.

form.Description: The form configuration object. Used only when the editing mode is "form".

mode.Description: Specifies how grid values can be edited manually.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for editing-related grid controls.

addRow.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Add" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowAdding option is true.

cancelAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Revert" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the mode option is set to batch.

cancelRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a cancel button displayed when a row is in the editing state. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowUpdating option is set to true.

confirmDeleteMessage.Description: Specifies a message to be displayed by a confirmation window. Setting this option makes sense only when the edit mode is "row".

confirmDeleteTitle.Description: Specifies text to be displayed in the title of a confirmation window. Setting this option makes sense only when the edit mode is "row".

deleteRow.Description: Specifies text for a button that deletes a row from a grid. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowDeleting option is set to true.

editRow.Description: Specifies text for a button that turns a row into the editing state. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowUpdating option is set to true.

saveAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Save" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the mode option is set to batch.

saveRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a save button displayed when a row is in the editing state. Setting this option makes sense only when the allowUpdating option is set to true.

undeleteRow.Description: Specifies text for a button that recovers a deleted row. Setting this option makes sense only if the grid uses the batch edit mode and the allowDeleting option is set to true.

validationCancelChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Cancel changes" button. Setting this option makes sense only when the mode option is set to cell and the validation capabilities are enabled. #####See Also##### - Validation Engine - Validation Engine - MVVM Approach

errorRowEnabled.Description: Indicates whether to show the error row for the grid.

allowExportSelectedData.Description: Allows an end user to export selected rows only.

enabled.Description: Enables the client-side export feature.

excelFilterEnabled.Description: Specifies whether to enable Excel filtering for the exported data in the resulting XLSX file.

excelWrapTextEnabled.Description: Specifies whether to enable word wrapping for the exported data in the resulting XLSX file.

fileName.Description: Specifies a default name for the file to which grid data is exported.

proxyUrl.Description: Specifies the URL of the server-side proxy that streams the resulting file to the end user to enable export in IE9 and Safari browsers.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for the export-related commands and hints.

exportAll.Description: Specifies the text of the command that exports all data.

exportSelectedRows.Description: Specifies the text of the drop-down menu command that exports selected rows.

exportTo.Description: Specifies the hint of the Export button when the allowExportSelectedData option is true.

applyFilter.Description: Specifies when to apply a filter.

applyFilterText.Description: Specifies text for the hint that pops up when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the "Apply Filter" button.

betweenEndText.Description: Specifies text for the range end in the 'between' filter type.

betweenStartText.Description: Specifies text for the range start in the 'between' filter type.

resetOperationText.Description: Specifies text for the reset operation in a filter list.

showAllText.Description: Specifies text for the operation of clearing the applied filter when a select box is used.

showOperationChooser.Description: Specifies whether or not an icon that allows the user to choose a filter operation is visible.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the filter row is visible or not.

grouping.Description: Specifies grouping settings and the behavior of grouped grid records.

allowCollapsing.Description: Specifies whether the user can collapse grouped records in a grid or not.

autoExpandAll.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not.

contextMenuEnabled.Description: Enables the user to group data using the context menu.

expandMode.Description: Specifies the event on which a group will be expanded/collapsed.

groupByThisColumn.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that groups data by a specific column.

groupContinuedMessage.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group is continued from the previous page.

groupContinuesMessage.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group continues on the next page.

ungroup.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of a specific column.

ungroupAll.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of all columns.

allowColumnDragging.Description: Specifies whether columns can be dragged onto or from the group panel.

emptyPanelText.Description: Specifies text displayed by the group panel when it does not contain any columns.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the dropdown menu invoked when using a column header filter.

cancel.Description: Specifies text for a button that closes the column header filter's dropdown menu without applying performed selection.

emptyValue.Description: Specifies text for the item specifying an empty value in the column header filter's dropdown menu.

ok.Description: Specifies text for a button that closes the column header filter's dropdown menu and applies specified filtering.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not the column header filter button is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the dropdown menu invoked when using a column header filter.

indicatorSrc.Description: Specifies a URL pointing to an image to be used as a loading indicator.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the load panel in pixels.

pager.Description: Specifies the options of a grid pager.

infoText.Description: Specifies the text accompanying the page navigator.

summary.Description: Specifies the options of the grid summary.

percentPrecision.Description: Use the series | label | format | percentPrecision instead.

position.Description: Specifies whether to display point labels inside or outside of series points. Applies only to bubble, range-like and bar-like series.

precision.Description: Use the series | label | format | precision option instead.

showForZeroValues.Description: Specifies whether or not to show labels for points with zero value. Applies only to bar-like series.

verticalOffset.Description: Along with horizontalOffset, shifts point labels from their initial positions.

visible.Description: Makes the point labels visible.

lowValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides low values for points of a financial series.

maxLabelCount.Description: Specifies a limit for the number of point labels.

minBarSize.Description: Specifies the minimal possible height (or length if the chart is rotated) of a bar in pixels. Applies only to bar-like series.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the series should be.

openValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides open values for points of a financial series.

pane.Description: Specifies which pane the series should belong to. Accepts the name of the pane.

point.Description: Configures series points in scatter, line- and area-like series.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects a series.

showInLegend.Description: Specifies whether to show the series in the legend or not.
